Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Enacts the "Building Recruitment and Incentives for Dedicated Government Employees (BRIDGE) act"
Summary: Enacts the "building recruitment and incentives for dedicated government employees (BRIDGE) act" which provides a service credit for members who were previously employed by the federal government.
LawCode: Add Art 20-A ยง1010, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to enacting the "building recruitment and incentives for dedicated government employees (BRIDGE) act"
